channel.title: Windows 7 is retarded?
channel.description: i have the port unblocked through the firewall for windows 7 and i have port forwarded correctly... belive me, unless i did it wrong 20 times its right...... but when i go to canyouseeme.org it says it can't see the port... and when i use 43594 as the listening port for bitcomet it says its still blocked... why?

item.title: Windows 7 is retarded?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

There are a few reasons why it might not be able to see your port.

  1. Your ISP doesn’t allow access through that specific port
  2. Your router hasn’t been forwarded correctly (sometimes you have to restart the router for it to take effect)
  3. Your computer firewall doesn’t allow incoming connections on that port.

Read full topic

item.title: Windows 7 is retarded?

no i unblocked the right port… how do i fix the modem thing… please dont tell me i have to port forward because i did that

@Jordiescape wrote:

Or your router/modem is still not allowing incoming connections no 43594.
